alert.note: Alert for Massac (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:23PM CDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MASSAC...SOUTH CENTRAL JOHNSON...CARLISLE... BALLARD...WESTERN MCCRACKEN AND NORTHWESTERN GRAVES COUNTIES... At 122 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mounds to near Wickliffe to near Clinton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Metropolis, La Center, Bardwell, Wickliffe, Barlow, Mound City, Barkley Regional Airport, West Paducah, Lovelaceville, Kevil, Joppa, Arlington, Belknap, Lowes, Fancy Farm and Blandville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for southern Illinois...western Kentucky...and southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
